III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Family Adoption Consultants is a small multi-room office space located within an office
complex in Utica, MI. The office space is primarily utilized by Family Adoption
Consultants for the purpose of conducting certification, foster care and adoption
services. Areas are available to ensure confidentiality. The office contains standard
office equipment for the purpose of conducting business related to that of a child placing
agency. Confidential files are stored in a locked cabinet.
B. Program Description
Family Adoption Consultants is a child placing agency that certifies foster homes for
licensure and places children in foster homes in southeast Michigan. The agency will
also evaluate applicants for adoption and place children for adoption through the State
of Michigan. The agency will conduct international adoptions, as well as direct domestic
placements or referrals made through the State of Michigan Department of Human
Services. The agency will also place children in foster homes, either for the purpose of
adoption, or through DHS referrals. The agency will provide certification orientation and
training to perspective and current foster families. The agency will orient persons
releasing a child for adoption and provide referrals for counseling services as needed.
Perspective adoptive parents will be oriented to the adoption process and evaluated.
The agency will provide referrals for post-finalization services, as needed. Family
Adoption Consultants will also coordinate services to the families served within foster
care.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
Family Adoption Consultant’s policies and procedures and supporting documentation
were reviewed. There is no rule or statutory violations currently noted.
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
The child placing agency noted in this Original Licensing Study Report,
Family Adoption Consultants, License # CB500316267, has as the licensee name
Family & Community Services, Inc., an out-of-state organization. Family &
Community Services, Inc. is being licensed in the State of Michigan to assume fiscal
and administrative responsibilities for another child placing agency, Family Adoption
Consultants, License # CB500201119.
Both Family Adoption Consultants (#CB500201119 and #CB500316267) are
licensed at the same address in Utica, MI. Family Adoption Consultants, License #
CB500201119 will close their current license within 60 days and transfer all current
foster homes and foster care/adoptive cases to Family & Community Services, Inc. -
Family Adoption Consultants, License # CB500316267. Failure to do so will result in
disciplinary action.
I recommend issuance of a provisional license to this child placing agency, private.
